name: Global Conference on Civil, Structural and Environmental Engineering
content: It is with great pleasure that we extend our warmest welcome to all of you to attend the Global Conference on Civil, Structural and Environmental Engineering, which is scheduled during March 20-22, 2025 in Berlin, Germany. GCCSEE2025, the premier global event for civil and environmental engineering professionals, attracts attendees from around the world to a conference and exhibition that showcases the latest industry advancements and emerging technologies.
